title: Create a Social Media Campaign
description: A social media manager is creating a campaign to promote a flash sale.

tasks.description: Draft the text and select the images for the posts on different social media platforms (e.g., Instagram, Facebook).
tasks.expected_outcome: The content for the campaign is created.

tasks.description: Use a social media management tool to schedule the posts to go live at a specific time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The posts are scheduled for optimal timing.

tasks.description: Monitor the posts for comments and engagement after they go live.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager can interact with customers and track the campaign's reach.
